mapper.sql: id, name, mapper_type, add_to_id_token, add_to_access_token, add_userinfo, value_json, remark, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag
mapper.select:
SELECT m.* FROM iam_oidc_client c LEFT JOIN iam_oidc_mapper_ref r ON r.client_id = c.id LEFT JOIN iam_oidc_mapper m ON r.mapper_id = m.id
AND c.client_id = #{clientId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AND c.del_flag = 0
mapper.insert: insert into iam_oidc_mapper (id, name, mapper_type, add_to_id_token, add_to_access_token, add_userinfo, value_json, remark, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mapperType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addToIdToken,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{addToAccessToken,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{addUserinfo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{valueJson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER})

name,

mapper.update:
update iam_oidc_mapper
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper_type = #{mapperType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
add_to_id_token = #{addToIdToken,jdbcType=INTEGER},
add_to_access_token = #{addToAccessToken,jdbcType=INTEGER},
add_userinfo = #{addUserinfo,jdbcType=INTEGER},
value_json = #{valueJson,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update iam_oidc_mapper set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mapper_type = #{mapperType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, add_to_id_token = #{addToIdToken,jdbcType=INTEGER}, add_to_access_token = #{addToAccessToken,jdbcType=INTEGER}, add_userinfo = #{addUserinfo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, value_json = #{valueJson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
